column6: There should be a space after a comma.
There should be a space after a period. If you are writing a URL or a filename, use the \url{} or \verb markup.
There should not be a space before the period at the end of a sentence.
There should not be a space before a comma.
There should not be a space before a punctuation mark. If in your language, typographic rules require a space here, LaTeX takes care of inserting it without your intervention.
